accounts.name: from
docs: The current owner transferring the ticket

accounts.name: to
docs: The new owner receiving the ticket

accounts.name: validator
docs: The gate staff validating the ticket

accounts.name: authority
docs: Event organizer or fraud prevention authority

errors.name: EventNameEmpty
errors.msg: E1002: Event name cannot be empty

errors.name: VenueEmpty
errors.msg: E1006: Venue name cannot be empty

errors.name: InvalidEventDate
errors.msg: E1007: Event date must be in the future

errors.msg: E1010: Cannot update event after it has started

errors.name: CannotCancelStartedEvent
errors.msg: E1011: Cannot cancel event after it has started

errors.name: EventAlreadyCancelled
errors.msg: E1014: Event has already been cancelled

errors.name: InvalidTicketPrice
errors.msg: E2001: Invalid ticket price (must be greater than 0)

errors.name: AlreadyValidated
errors.msg: E2004: Ticket has already been validated

errors.name: MaximumTicketsExceeded
errors.msg: E2007: Maximum tickets per wallet exceeded
